languages.title: Supported languages.
languages.description: This property indicates all the supported languages by the services avalable on the LoIDE Web Application.

name.title: Language name.
name.description: This property indicates the language name.

value.title: Language value.
value.description: This property indicates the language value used in communication with other services.

syntax-highlighter.title: Syntax-Highlighter path.
syntax-highlighter.description: This property indicates the syntax highlighter path corresponding to this language.

name.title: Syntax-Highlighter name.
name.description: This property indicates the syntax-highlighter name.

description.title: Syntax-Highlighter description.
description.description: This property indicates the syntax-highlighter description.

path.title: Syntax-Highlighter path.
path.description: This property indicates the syntax-highlighter file path.

solvers.title: Supporting solvers.
solvers.description: This property indicates all supporting solvers for this language.

name.title: Solver name.
name.description: This property indicates the solver name.

value.title: Solver value.
value.description: This property indicates the solver value used in communication with other services.

executors.title: Supporting executors.
executors.description: This property indicates all supporting executors for this solver.

options.title: Solver option
options.description: This property indicates the options supported by the solver.

name.title: Option name.
name.description: This property indicates the option name.

value.title: Option value.
value.description: This property indicates the command line argument passed to the solver.

word_argument.title: Word argument.
word_argument.description: This property indicates if this type of argument requires the second argument or it's just a word argument (this is just a flag).

description.title: Option description.
description.description: This property contains the description of the option.

protocol.title: Protocol name.
protocol.description: This property indicates the protocol name to use for a connection with this Executor.

url.title: Executor URL.
url.description: This property indicates the executor URL to connect with it.

name.title: Executor name.
name.description: This property indicates the executor name.

value.title: Executor value.
value.description: This property indicates the option value.

path.title: Executor path.
path.description: This property indicates the executor path relative to its URL.
path._comment: Add the pattern to match with the 'path'.

port.title: Connection port number.
port.description: This property indicates the port number open on this executor for the incoming connections.
